biotools.summary: Annotation tool that recommends candidate Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) terms to a LOINC (Laboratory Observation Identifier Names and Codes) test based on lexical matching between HPO term definitions and the name of a laboratory test.

bioschemas.name: LOINC2HPO
bioschemas.summary: Annotation tool that recommends candidate Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) terms to a LOINC (Laboratory Observation Identifier Names and Codes) test based on lexical matching between HPO term definitions and the name of a laboratory test.
